summary.profile: Innovative Full Stack Developer with expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript and AI integration using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and LangChain. Passionate about building scalable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences and drive technological innovation through cutting-edge solutions.

experience.title: AI/ML Engineer
experience.description: Developed a cutting-edge AI-powered platform that efficiently analyzes and processes large volumes of data, enabling real-time insights and automation. Implemented and optimized machine learning models for natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision tasks.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of a client-facing web application. Designed and implemented new features using React.js and Node.js, and improved application performance by 20% through code optimization.

projects.name: NASA Data Explorer
projects.description: Interactive data visualization platform built with React.js and Node.js, leveraging NASA's public API to display astronomical data.

projects.name: E-commerce Backend System
projects.description: A robust and scalable e-commerce backend built with Python (Django) and a PostgreSQL database. Implemented user authentication, product management, and a secure payment gateway.
